column2: Ogohlantirish: Captchani kirishda katta / kichik harflarga e'tibor bering.

column1: After number of attempts to login
column2: Bir necha marta ruxsat berishga urinishdan so'ng

column1: If 0 is specified, CAPTCHA on the Login form will be always available.
column2: 0 belgilansa, kirish shaklidagi CAPTCHA har doim mavjud bo'ladi.

column1: Number of Unsuccessful Attempts to Login
Please specify 8 symbols at the most. Range allowed (e.g. 3-5)
column2: Iltimos, 8 ta belgini kiriting. Range ruxsat etilgan (masalan, 3-5)

column1:
Please use only letters (a-z or A-Z) or numbers (0-9) in this field. No spaces or other characters are allowed.
Similar looking characters (e.g. "i", "l", "1") decrease chance of correct recognition by customer.
column2:
Ushbu maydonda faqat harflar (a-z yoki A-Z) yoki raqamlar (0-9) dan foydalaning. Bo'sh joylar yoki boshqa belgilarga ruxsat berilmaydi.
Xuddi shunga o'xshash belgilar (masalan, "i", "l", "1") mijoz tomonidan to'g'ri aniqlash ehtimolligini kamaytiradi.
